Articles.Content:
![lgVBYJW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lgVBYJW.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

I was inspired by the WW2 Propaganda posters, I thought I'd splice one together from the 'Bad Piggies' loadscreen and an excellent artist whose name escapes me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Brilliant! I was planning on doing something like that myself ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well I do this kinda crap for a living, but if you have a good idea (or a good cause) I'll draw something for you!

(The things I do for the KSP community, jeez ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

-THEY'VE GOT THE GUTS! LET'S KEEP 'EM FLYING!!
Looks likes someone likes a certain spinoff of a well known game about round, colored lifeforms from the class Aves that are in a bad mood...

> 
> Looks likes someone likes a certain spinoff of a well known game about round, colored lifeforms from the class Aves that are in a bad mood...

"Immorally behaved Sus Scrofa Scrofae" I think it was called
